    • autoCorrectPreferences

      public void autoCorrectPreferences()
      Description copied from class: MetisPreferenceSet
      Hook to enable preferenceSets to autoCorrect their preferences.

      This is used both to initialise preferencesSet defaults and to adjust the set when a value changes.

      Specified by:
      autoCorrectPreferences in class MetisPreferenceSet
